EmailID.description: Specifies the ID of an email message associated with a send.

EmailName.description: Specifies the name of an email message associated with a send.

FromAddress.description: Indicates From address associated with a object. Deprecated for email send definitions and triggered send definitions.

FromName.description: Specifies the default email message From Name. Deprecated for email send definitions and triggered send definitions.

IsAlwaysOn.description: Indicates whether the request can be performed while the system is is maintenance mode. A value of true indicates the system will process the request.

IsMultipart.description: Indicates whether the email is sent with Multipart/MIME enabled.

SendDate.description: Indicates the date on which a send occurred. Set this value to have a CST (Central Standard Time) value.

SentDate.description: Indicates date on which a send took place.

Status.description: Defines status of object. Status of an address.

Subject.description: Contains subject area information for a message.
